import React from 'react' import Rating from '../components/Rating'; //import Product from '../components/Product' import data from '../data'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function ProductPage(props) { const product = data.products.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); if(!product){ return
Product Not Found
; } return
Back to Home

  • {product.name}

  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock>0 ? ( In Stock ):( Unavailable )}
; }
